1. The following story is from my favorite genre, Science Fiction. It explains how a group of astronauts must rationally pursue pleasure to avoid painful consequences on their mission across the galaxy. "But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing of a cosmic pleasure and praising cosmic pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the spaceship's system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the cosmos, the master-builder of interstellar happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids cosmic pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue cosmic pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain cosmic pain of itself, because it is pain, but occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and cosmic pain can procure him some great cosmic pleasure."
